summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Water Department to lay a two-inch water main in the following described streets: 36th Avenue West from West Bertona Street to West Barrett Street; 35th Avenue West from West Bertona Street to West Barrett Street; 34th Avenue West from West Bertona Street to West Barrett Street; 33rd Avenue West from West Bertona Street to West Barrett Street; 32nd Avenue West from West Bertona Street to Grand Bouelvard; West Bertona Street from 34th Avenue West to 32nd Avenue West.
